Name: Elf
Description: Elves are graceful, long-lived humanoids with a deep connection to nature and magic. Known for their keen senses and agility, they often live in forests and maintain ancient traditions.

Name: Drow
Description: Drow, or dark elves, dwell in the Underdark and are known for their superior darkvision and innate magical abilities. They are often viewed with suspicion due to their sinister reputation.

Name: Githyanki
Description: Githyanki are astral warriors who escaped the tyranny of the mind flayers. Trained in combat and psionics, they are fierce, disciplined, and often at odds with other races.

Name: Human
Description: Humans are the most adaptable and ambitious of the common races. With a wide range of cultures and traits, they thrive in nearly any environment and pursue greatness in all forms.

Name: Tiefling
Description: Tieflings are humanoids with infernal heritage, often marked by horns, tails, and unusual skin tones. They possess innate magical abilities and a natural resistance to fire.
